text: aur kaha, jin logon ne shirk (mishranavaad) kiyaah yadi allaah chaahata, to ham usake siva kisee cheez kee ibaadat (vandana) na karate, na ham aur na hamaare baap-daada aur na usake aadesh ke bina kisee cheez ko haî€¼raam (varjit) karate. aise hee, inase poorv vaale logon ne kiya. to rasoolon par keval khule roop se upadesh pahuncha dena hai
